verses.text: Many a \w time|strong="H7227"\w* have they \w afflicted|strong="H6887"\w* me from my \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, may \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* now \w say|strong="H0559"\w*:\f + \fr 129.1 \ft Many…: or, Much\f*

Many a \w time|strong="H7227"\w* have they \w afflicted|strong="H6887"\w* me from my \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*: yet they have not \w prevailed|strong="H3201"\w* against me.\f + \fr 129.2 \ft Many…: or, Much\f*
The \w plowers|strong="H2790"\w* \w plowed|strong="H2790"\w* upon my \w back|strong="H1354"\w*: they made \w long|strong="H0748"\w* their \w furrows|strong="H4618"\w*.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: he hath cut \w asunder|strong="H7112"\w* the \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.
Let them all be \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w* and \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w* that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.
Let them be as the \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \add upon\add* the \w housetops|strong="H1406"\w*, which \w withereth|strong="H3001"\w* \w afore|strong="H6927"\w* it groweth \w up|strong="H8025"\w*:
Wherewith the \w mower|strong="H7114"\w* \w filleth|strong="H4390"\w* not his \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*; nor he that bindeth \w sheaves|strong="H6014"\w* his \w bosom|strong="H2683"\w*.

Neither do they which go \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add be\add* upon you: we \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* you in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
